thought: I need to implement the Slack message post action parameters to send a text message to the #weathers channel with a placeholder text, which will be replaced dynamically in the workflow.
plan: Set action_1 params to select channel by name '#weathers'.
Set text to a placeholder for weather info, will be replaced in workflow.
Test Slack message sending with placeholder text.
criticism: Currently action_1 params are empty, so the Slack message cannot be sent. Setting correct params is essential to send messages.

tool_input.comments: Send a simple text message to Slack channel #weathers with placeholder text, to be replaced in workflow.
TODO: Test Slack message sending with placeholder.
Replace placeholder with dynamic weather info in workflow.
